newsitem.title: USA: Harbinger to make 2.9 mln shr offering.
newsitem.headline: Harbinger to make 2.9 mln shr offering.

text.p: Harbinger Corp said Tuesday it was preparing a secondary public offering of 2.9 million shares at $30.75 each.

The company said in a statement that it will offer 1.8 million of the shares, while shareholders will offer the rest. Those shareholders are AXA Equity & Law Assurance Society Plc, Orbis Pension Trustees Ltd, and Vulcan Ventures Inc, it added.
Harbinger said Alex. Brown & Sons Inc, Robinson-Humphrey Co Inc. Robertson, Stephens & Co, and Interstate/Johnson Lane Corp are underwriting the offer.
It said in an earlier release that it would use the proceeds for general corporate purposes, including acquisitions.
Harbinger's stock was up 1-1/2 at 32-1/2 at midday.
The company, which has more than 18 million shares in circulation, provides computer software to enable people to trade over the Internet.
